title: 7 Pecados Rurais (2013)
description: The film tells the story of Quim (João Paulo Rodrigues) and Zé (Pedro Alves), who are reunited with two cousins away from Lisbon. Together, they decide to revive past follies in Curral de Moinas but an unforeseen happens and when find themselves, in the heavens. There God (Nicolau Breyner) offers them a second chance with a condition: prove abdicated immoral and licentious life and renouncing life, so the seven deadly sins: lust, gluttony, wrath, envy, greed, pride and laziness. Will Quim and Zé be able to resist temptation? Written by João Ferreira
